name: They That Remember
description: They That Remember aims to be a first-person horror game that takes place aboard a  civilian spacecraft, where an unknown creature has attached itself and unleashed a monster  causing terror among the crew. The player is tasked with completing a series of tasks while  evading the creature within a decaying spacecraft, in order to destroy it, however, the player  is stuck in a death loop causing them to restart after every death. With death however comes  with learning more about the monster and its behaviours, with the character leaving tips  within the environment from past attempts. Additionally, the monster will have set behaviour  patterns that will be explained through the environment and within the creature design to  help the player learn these behaviours and adapt, forcing the player to learn a range of skills,  interaction methods and allowing them to experience unique interactions when faced with  the creature.
